title.text: RFC 7455: Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL): Fault Management

Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL): Fault Management
contents.zh-CHS: 大量链路的透明互连（TRILL）：故障管理

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document specifies Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL) Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) fault management. Methods in this document follow the CFM (Connectivity Fault Management) framework defined in IEEE 802.1 and reuse OAM tools where possible. Additional messages and TLVs are defined for TRILL-specific applications or for cases where a different set of information is required other than CFM as defined in IEEE 802.1. This document updates RFC 6325.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了大量链路的透明互连（TRILL）操作、管理和维护（OAM）故障管理。本文档中的方法遵循IEEE 802.1中定义的CFM（连接故障管理）框架，并在可能的情况下重用OAM工具。额外的消息和TLV是为TRILL特定的应用程序定义的，或者在需要一组不同于IEEE 802.1中定义的CFM的信息的情况下定义的。本文档更新了RFC 6325。

1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: The general structure of TRILL OAM messages is presented in [RFC7174]. TRILL OAM messages consist of six parts: Link Header, TRILL Header, Flow Entropy, OAM Ethertype, OAM Message Channel, and Link Trailer.
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM消息的一般结构如[RFC7174]所示。TRILL OAM消息由六部分组成：链接头、TRILL头、流熵、OAM以太类型、OAM消息通道和链接尾。

contents.text: The OAM Message Channel carries various control information and OAM-related data between TRILL switches, also known as RBridges or Routing Bridges.
contents.zh-CHS: OAM消息通道在TRILL交换机（也称为RBridge或路由桥）之间承载各种控制信息和OAM相关数据。

contents.text: A common OAM Message Channel representation can be shared between different technologies. This consistency between different OAM technologies promotes nested fault monitoring and isolation between technologies that share the same OAM framework.
contents.zh-CHS: 可以在不同的技术之间共享通用的OAM消息通道表示。不同OAM技术之间的这种一致性促进了共享同一OAM框架的技术之间的嵌套故障监视和隔离。

contents.text: The TRILL OAM Message Channel is formatted as specified in IEEE Connectivity Fault Management (CFM) [8021Q].
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM消息通道按照IEEE连接故障管理（CFM）[8021Q]中的规定进行格式化。

contents.text: The ITU-T Y.1731 [Y1731] standard utilizes the same messaging format as [8021Q] OAM messages where applicable. This document takes a similar stance and reuses [8021Q] in TRILL OAM. It is assumed that readers are familiar with [8021Q] and [Y1731]. Readers who are not familiar with these documents are encouraged to review them.
contents.zh-CHS: ITU-T Y.1731[Y1731]标准在适用的情况下使用与[8021Q]OAM消息相同的消息格式。本文档采取了类似的立场，并在TRILL OAM中重用了[8021Q]。假设读者熟悉[8021Q]和[Y1731]。鼓励不熟悉这些文件的读者阅读。

contents.text: This document specifies TRILL OAM fault management. It updates [RFC6325] as specified in Section 3.1. TRILL performance monitoring is specified in [RFC7456].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档规定了TRILL OAM故障管理。按照第3.1节的规定更新[RFC6325]。[RFC7456]中规定了颤音性能监控。

contents.text: 3. General Format of TRILL OAM Packets
contents.zh-CHS: 3. TRILL OAM数据包的通用格式

contents.text: The TRILL forwarding paradigm allows an implementation to select a path from a set of equal-cost paths to forward a unicast TRILL Data packet. For multi-destination TRILL Data packets, a distribution tree is chosen by the TRILL switch that ingresses or creates the packet. Selection of the path of choice is implementation dependent at each hop for unicast and at the ingress for multi-destination. However, it is a common practice to utilize Layer 2 through Layer 4 information in the frame payload for path selection.
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL转发范例允许实现从一组等成本路径中选择路径来转发单播TRILL数据分组。对于多目的地TRILL数据包，由进入或创建数据包的TRILL交换机选择分发树。对于单播，路径选择取决于每个跃点的实现，对于多目的地，路径选择取决于入口的实现。然而，通常的做法是利用帧有效载荷中的第2层到第4层信息进行路径选择。

contents.text: For accurate monitoring and/or diagnostics, OAM messages are required to follow the same path as corresponding data packets. [RFC7174] presents the high-level format of OAM messages. The details of the TRILL OAM frame format are defined in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了进行准确的监视和/或诊断，OAM消息需要遵循与相应数据包相同的路径。[RFC7174]显示OAM消息的高级格式。TRILL OAM帧格式的详细信息在本文档中定义。

contents.text: Figure 1: Format of TRILL OAM Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 图1:TRILL OAM消息的格式

contents.text: o Link Header: Media-dependent header. For Ethernet, this includes the Destination MAC, Source MAC, VLAN (optional), and Ethertype fields.
contents.zh-CHS: o 链接头：媒体相关头。对于以太网，这包括目标MAC、源MAC、VLAN（可选）和以太网类型字段。

contents.text: o TRILL Header: Fixed size of 6 bytes when the Extended Header is not included [RFC6325].
contents.zh-CHS: o TRILL标头：不包括扩展标头时，固定大小为6字节[RFC6325]。

contents.text: o Flow Entropy: A 96-byte, fixed-size field. The rightmost bits of the field MUST be padded with zeros, up to 96 bytes, when the flow-entropy information is less than 96 bytes. Flow Entropy enables emulation of the forwarding behavior of the desired data packets. The Flow Entropy field starts with the Inner.MacDA. The offset of the Inner.MacDA depends on whether extensions are included or not as specified in [RFC7179] and [RFC6325]. Such extensions are not commonly supported in current TRILL implementations.
contents.zh-CHS: o 流熵：一个96字节的固定大小字段。当流熵信息小于96字节时，字段最右边的位必须用零填充，最多96字节。流熵可以模拟所需数据包的转发行为。流熵场从内部.MacDA开始。INTERNAR.MacDA的偏移量取决于是否包含[RFC7179]和[RFC6325]中指定的扩展。当前TRILL实现中通常不支持这种扩展。

contents.text: o OAM Ethertype: A 16-bit Ethertype that identifies the OAM Message Channel that follows. This document specifies using the Ethertype 0x8902 allocated for CFM [8021Q].
contents.zh-CHS: o OAM Ethertype：一个16位的Ethertype，用于标识随后的OAM消息通道。本文档指定使用分配给CFM[8021Q]的Ethertype 0x8902。

contents.text: o OAM Message Channel: A variable-size section that carries OAM-related information. The message format is as specified in [8021Q].
contents.zh-CHS: o OAM消息通道：承载OAM相关信息的可变大小部分。消息格式如[8021Q]所述。

contents.text: o Link Trailer: Media-dependent trailer. For Ethernet, this is the FCS (Frame Check Sequence).
contents.zh-CHS: o 链接预告片：媒体相关预告片。对于以太网，这是FCS（帧检查序列）。

contents.text: 3.1. Identification of TRILL OAM Frames
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. TRILL-OAM帧的识别

contents.text: TRILL, as originally specified in [RFC6325], did not have a specific flag or method to identify OAM frames. This document updates [RFC6325] to include specific methods to identify TRILL OAM frames. Section 3.2 explains the details of the method.
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL最初在[RFC6325]中指定，没有用于标识OAM帧的特定标志或方法。本文档更新了[RFC6325]，包括识别TRILL OAM帧的具体方法。第3.2节解释了该方法的细节。

contents.text: 3.2. Use of TRILL OAM Alert Flag
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. TRILL-OAM警报标志的使用

contents.text: The TRILL Header, as defined in [RFC6325], has two reserved bits. This document specifies use of the reserved bit next to the Version field in the TRILL Header as the Alert flag. The Alert flag will be denoted by "A". RBridges MUST NOT use the "A" flag for forwarding decisions such as the selection of which ECMP path or multi-destination tree to select.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC6325]中定义的TRILL报头有两个保留位。本文档指定使用颤音标题中版本字段旁边的保留位作为警报标志。警报标志将用“A”表示。RBridges不得将“A”标志用于转发决策，例如选择哪个ECMP路径或多目标树。

contents.text: Implementations that comply with this document MUST utilize the "A" flag and CFM Ethertype to identify TRILL OAM frames.
contents.zh-CHS: 符合本文档要求的实现必须使用“A”标志和CFM Ethertype来识别TRILL OAM帧。

contents.text: Figure 2: TRILL Header with the "A" Flag
contents.zh-CHS: 图2：带有“A”标志的颤音标题

contents.text: o A (1 bit): Indicates this is a possible OAM frame and is subject to specific handling as specified in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: o A（1位）：表示这是一个可能的OAM帧，需要按照本文档中的规定进行特定处理。

contents.text: All other TRILL Header fields carry the same meaning as defined in [RFC6325].
contents.zh-CHS: 所有其他颤音标题字段的含义与[RFC6325]中的定义相同。

contents.text: 3.2.1. Handling of TRILL Frames with the "A" Flag
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2.1. 使用“A”标志处理颤音帧

contents.text: The value "1" in the "A" flag indicates TRILL frames that may qualify as OAM frames. Implementations are further REQUIRED to validate such frames by comparing the value at the OAM Ethertype (Figure 1) location with the CFM Ethertype "0x8902" [8021Q]. If the value matches, such frames are identified as TRILL OAM frames and SHOULD be processed as discussed in Section 4.
contents.zh-CHS: “A”标志中的值“1”表示符合OAM帧条件的颤音帧。通过将OAM Ethertype（图1）位置的值与CFM Ethertype“0x8902”[8021Q]进行比较，还需要实现来验证这些帧。如果值匹配，则此类帧被标识为TRILL OAM帧，并应按照第4节中的讨论进行处理。

contents.text: Frames with the "A" flag set that do not contain a CFM Ethertype are not considered OAM frames. Such frames MUST be silently discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 设置了“A”标志且不包含CFM Ethertype的帧不被视为OAM帧。这样的帧必须悄悄地丢弃。

contents.text: OAM-capable RBridges MUST NOT generate OAM frames to an RBridge that is not OAM capable.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持OAM的RBridge不能向不支持OAM的RBridge生成OAM帧。

contents.text: Intermediate RBridges that are not OAM capable (i.e., do not understand the "A" flag) follow the process defined in Section 3.3 of [RFC6325] and forward OAM frames with the "A" flag unaltered.
contents.zh-CHS: 不支持OAM的中间RBridge（即，不理解“A”标志）遵循[RFC6325]第3.3节中定义的过程，并在“A”标志不变的情况下转发OAM帧。

contents.text: 3.3. OAM Capability Announcement
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. OAM能力公告

contents.text: Any given RBridge can be (1) OAM incapable, (2) OAM capable with new extensions, or (3) OAM capable with the backwards-compatibility method. The OAM request originator, prior to origination of the request, is required to identify the OAM capability of the target and generate the appropriate OAM message.
contents.zh-CHS: 任何给定的RBridge都可以（1）不支持OAM，（2）支持使用新扩展的OAM，或（3）支持使用向后兼容方法的OAM。在发起请求之前，OAM请求发起人需要识别目标的OAM能力并生成适当的OAM消息。

contents.text: The capability flags defined in the TRILL Version sub-TLV (TRILL-VER) [RFC7176] will be utilized for announcing OAM capabilities. The following OAM-related capability flags are defined:
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL版本子TLV（TRILL-VER）[RFC7176]中定义的功能标志将用于宣布OAM功能。定义了以下与OAM相关的功能标志：

contents.text: O - OAM capable
contents.zh-CHS: O-OAM功能

contents.text: B - Backwards-compatible OAM
contents.zh-CHS: B-向后兼容的OAM

contents.text: A capability announcement with the "O" flag set to 1 and the "B" flag set to 1 indicates that the originating RBridge is OAM capable but utilizes the backwards-compatibility method defined in Appendix A. A capability announcement with the "O" flag set to 1 and the "B" flag set to 0 indicates that the originating RBridge is OAM capable and utilizes the method specified in Section 3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: “O”标志设置为1，“B”标志设置为1的能力公告表示发起RBridge支持OAM，但使用附录A中定义的向后兼容方法。将“O”标志设置为1和“B”的能力公告设置为0的标志表示发起RBridge支持OAM，并使用第3.2节中规定的方法。

contents.text: When the "O" flag is set to 0, the announcing implementation is considered not capable of OAM, and the "B" flag is ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 当“O”标志设置为0时，宣布实现被认为不能进行OAM，而忽略“B”标志。

contents.text: Figure 3: TRILL-VER Sub-TLV [RFC7176] with "O" and "B" Flags
contents.zh-CHS: 图3：带“O”和“B”标志的颤音版本子TLV[RFC7176]

contents.text: In Figure 3, "A" is the Affinity sub-TLV support flag as indicated in [RFC7176], and "F" is the FGL-safe flag as indicated in [RFC7172] and [RFC7176]. The "O" and "B" flags are located after the "F" flag in the Capability and Header Flags field of the TRILL-VER sub-TLV, as depicted in Figure 3 above. Usage of the "O" and "B" flags is discussed above.
contents.zh-CHS: 在图3中，“A”是[RFC7176]中所示的亲和子TLV支持标志，“F”是[RFC7172]和[RFC7176]中所示的FGL安全标志。“O”和“B”标志位于TRILL-VER子TLV的能力和标题标志字段中的“F”标志之后，如上图3所示。上面讨论了“O”和“B”标志的用法。

contents.text: Absence of the TRILL-VER sub-TLV means the announcing RBridge is not OAM capable.
contents.zh-CHS: 缺少TRILL-VER子TLV意味着RBridge不支持OAM。

contents.text: 3.4. Identification of the OAM Message
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4. OAM消息的标识

contents.text: The ingress RBridge nickname allows recipients to identify the origin of the message in most cases. However, when an out-of-band reply is generated, the responding RBridge nickname is not easy to identify.
contents.zh-CHS: 在大多数情况下，ingress RBridge昵称允许收件人识别邮件的来源。然而，当生成带外应答时，响应的RBridge昵称不容易识别。

contents.text: The [8021Q] Sender ID TLV (1) provides methods to identify the device by including the Chassis ID. The Chassis ID allows different addressing formats such as IANA Address Family enumerations. IANA has allocated Address Family Number 16396 for TRILL nickname. In TRILL OAM, the Chassis ID sub-type of the Sender ID TLV is set to 16396, and the Chassis ID field contains the corresponding TRILL nickname.
contents.zh-CHS: [8021Q]发送方ID TLV（1）提供了通过包括机箱ID来识别设备的方法。机箱ID允许不同的寻址格式，如IANA地址族枚举。IANA已为TRILL昵称分配了地址系列号16396。在TRILL OAM中，发送方ID TLV的机箱ID子类型设置为16396，机箱ID字段包含相应的TRILL昵称。

contents.text: When the Sender ID TLV is present and the Chassis ID sub-type is set to 16396, the sender RBridge TRILL nickname SHOULD be derived from the nickname embedded in the Chassis ID. Otherwise, the sender RBridge TRILL nickname SHOULD be derived from the ingress RBridge nickname.
contents.zh-CHS: 当存在发送方ID TLV且机箱ID子类型设置为16396时，发送方RBridge TRILL昵称应源自机箱ID中嵌入的昵称。否则，发送方RBridge TRILL昵称应源自ingress RBridge昵称。

contents.text: 4. TRILL OAM Layering vs. IEEE Layering
contents.zh-CHS: 4. TRILL OAM分层与IEEE分层

contents.text: This section presents the placement of the TRILL OAM shim within the IEEE 802.1 layers. The transmit and receive processing are explained.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍TRILL OAM垫片在IEEE 802.1层中的位置。说明了发送和接收处理。

contents.text: Figure 4: Placement of TRILL MP within IEEE 802.1
contents.zh-CHS: 图4:IEEE 802.1中TRILL MP的位置

contents.text: [RFC6325], Section 4.6 as updated by [RFC7180] provides a detailed explanation of frame processing. Please refer to those documents for additional details and for processing scenarios not covered herein.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC6325]，由[RFC7180]更新的第4.6节提供了帧处理的详细说明。请参考这些文件以了解更多详细信息和本文未涵盖的处理场景。

contents.text: Sections 4.1 and 4.2 apply to links using a broadcast LAN technology such as Ethernet.
contents.zh-CHS: 第4.1节和第4.2节适用于使用广播LAN技术（如以太网）的链路。

contents.text: On links using an inherently point-to-point technology, such as PPP [RFC6361], there is no Outer.MacDA, Outer.MacSA, or Outer.VLAN because these are part of the Link Header for Ethernet. Point-to-point links typically have Link Headers without these fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 在使用固有点到点技术的链路上，如PPP[RFC6361]，没有Outer.MacDA、Outer.MacSA或Outer.VLAN，因为它们是以太网链路头的一部分。点到点链接通常具有不带这些字段的链接头。

contents.text: 4.1. Processing at the ISS Layer
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. ISS层的处理

contents.text: 4.1.1. Receive Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1.1. 接收处理

contents.text: The ISS layer receives an indication from the port. It extracts DA and SA, and it marks the remainder of the payload as M1. The ISS layer passes on (DA, SA, M1) as an indication to the higher layer.
contents.zh-CHS: ISS层接收来自端口的指示。它提取DA和SA，并将有效负载的剩余部分标记为M1。ISS层将（DA、SA、M1）作为指示传递给更高层。

contents.text: For TRILL Ethernet frames, this is Outer.MacDA and Outer.MacSA. M1 is the remainder of the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于TRILL以太网帧，这是Outer.MacDA和Outer.MacSA。M1是数据包的剩余部分。

contents.text: 4.1.2. Transmit Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1.2. 传输处理

contents.text: The ISS layer receives an indication from the higher layer that contains (DA, SA, M1). It constructs an Ethernet frame and passes down to the port.
contents.zh-CHS: ISS层从包含（DA、SA、M1）的较高层接收指示。它构造一个以太网帧并向下传递到端口。

contents.text: 4.2. End-Station VLAN and Priority Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 端站VLAN和优先级处理

contents.text: 4.2.1. Receive Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.1. 接收处理

contents.text: Receive (DA, SA, M1) indication from the ISS layer. Extract the VLAN ID and priority from the M1 part of the received indication (or derive them from the port defaults or other default parameters) and construct (DA, SA, VLAN, PRI, M2). VLAN+PRI+M2 maps to M1 in the received indication. Pass (DA, SA, VLAN, PRI, M2) to the TRILL Encapsulation/Decapsulation layer.
contents.zh-CHS: 从ISS层接收（DA、SA、M1）指示。从接收到的指示的M1部分提取VLAN ID和优先级（或从端口默认值或其他默认参数派生它们）并构造（DA、SA、VLAN、PRI、M2）。VLAN+PRI+M2映射到接收指示中的M1。将（DA、SA、VLAN、PRI、M2）传递到TRILL封装/去封装层。

contents.text: 4.2.2. Transmit Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2.2. 传输处理

contents.text: Receive (DA, SA, VLAN, PRI, M2) indication from the TRILL Encapsulation/Decapsulation layer. Merge VLAN, PRI, M2 to form M1. Pass down (DA, SA, M1) to the ISS layer.
contents.zh-CHS: 从TRILL封装/去封装层接收（DA、SA、VLAN、PRI、M2）指示。合并VLAN、PRI、M2形成M1。向下传递（DA、SA、M1）至ISS层。

contents.text: 4.3. TRILL Encapsulation and Decapsulation Layer
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3. TRILL封装和去封装层

contents.text: 4.3.1. Receive Processing for Unicast Packets
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.1. 单播数据包的接收处理

contents.text: o Receive indication (DA, SA, VLAN, PRI, M2) from the End-Station VLAN and Priority Processing layer.
contents.zh-CHS: o 从终端站VLAN和优先级处理层接收指示（DA、SA、VLAN、PRI、M2）。

contents.text: o If the DA matches the port Local DA and the frame is of TRILL Ethertype:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA与端口本地DA匹配且帧为TRILL Ethertype：

contents.text: - Discard DA, SA, VLAN, and PRI. From M2, derive (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, i-VL, M3).
contents.zh-CHS: - 丢弃DA、SA、VLAN和PRI。从M2推导（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、i-VL、M3）。

contents.text: - If TRILL nickname is Local and TRILL Header Alert flag is set:
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果颤音昵称为本地且设置了颤音标题警报标志：

contents.text: * Pass on to OAM processing.
contents.zh-CHS: * 传递到OAM处理。

contents.text: - Else, pass on (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, i-VL, M3) to the RBridge layer.
contents.zh-CHS: - 否则，将（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、i-VL、M3）传递到RBridge层。

contents.text: o If the DA matches the port Local DA and the Ethertype is RBridge-Channel [RFC7178]:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA与端口本地DA匹配且Ethertype为RBridge通道[RFC7178]：

contents.text: - Process as a possible unicast native RBridge Channel packet.
contents.zh-CHS: - 作为可能的单播本机RBridge通道数据包进行处理。

contents.text: o If the DA matches the port Local DA and the Ethertype is neither TRILL nor RBridge-Channel:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA与端口本地DA匹配，且Ethertype既不是TRILL也不是RBridge通道：

contents.text: - Discard packet.
contents.zh-CHS: - 丢弃数据包。

contents.text: o If the DA does not match, the port is Appointed Forwarder for VLAN, and the Ethertype is not TRILL or RBridge-Channel:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA不匹配，则端口被指定为VLAN的转发器，并且Ethertype不是TRILL或RBridge通道：

contents.text: - Insert TRILL-HDR and send (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA,i-VL, M3) indication to the RBridge layer (this is the TRILL Ingress Function).
contents.zh-CHS: - 插入TRILL-HDR并向RBridge层发送（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、i-VL、M3）指示（这是TRILL入口功能）。

contents.text: 4.3.2. Transmit Processing for Unicast Packets
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.2. 单播数据包的传输处理

contents.text: o Receive indication (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, iVL, M3) from the RBridge layer.
contents.zh-CHS: o 从RBridge层接收指示（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、iVL、M3）。

contents.text: o If the egress TRILL nickname is local:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果出口颤音昵称是本地的：

contents.text: - If the port is Appointed Forwarder for iVL, the port is not configured as a trunk or point-to-point (P2P) port, the TRILL Alert flag is set, and the OAM Ethertype is present, then:
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果该端口被指定为iVL的转发器，该端口未配置为中继或点对点（P2P）端口，设置了TRILL警报标志，并且存在OAM Ethertype，则：

contents.text: * Strip TRILL-HDR and construct (DA, SA, VLAN, M2) (this is the TRILL Egress Function).
contents.zh-CHS: * 剥离TRILL-HDR并构建（DA、SA、VLAN、M2）（这是TRILL出口功能）。

contents.text: - Else:
contents.zh-CHS: - 其他：

contents.text: * Discard packet.
contents.zh-CHS: * 丢弃数据包。

contents.text: o If the egress TRILL nickname is not local:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果出口颤音昵称不是本地的：

contents.text: - Insert Outer.MacDA, Outer.MacSA, Outer.VLAN, and TRILL Ethertype, and construct (DA, SA, VLAN, M2) where M2 is (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, iVL, M).
contents.zh-CHS: - 插入Outer.MacDA、Outer.MacSA、Outer.VLAN和TRILL Ethertype，并构造（DA、SA、VLAN、M2），其中M2是（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、iVL、M）。

contents.text: o Forward (DA, SA, V, M2) to the End-Station VLAN and Priority Processing layer.
contents.zh-CHS: o 转发（DA、SA、V、M2）到终端站VLAN和优先级处理层。

contents.text: 4.3.3. Receive Processing for Multicast Packets
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.3. 多播数据包的接收处理

contents.text: o Receive (DA, SA, V, M2) from the End-Station VLAN and Priority Processing layer.
contents.zh-CHS: o 从终端站VLAN和优先级处理层接收（DA、SA、V、M2）。

contents.text: o If the DA is All-RBridges and the Ethertype is TRILL:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA为所有RBridges且Ethertype为TRILL：

contents.text: - Strip DA, SA, and V. From M2, extract (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, iVL, and M3).
contents.zh-CHS: - 从M2中剥离DA、SA和V，提取（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、iVL和M3）。

contents.text: - If the TRILL Alert flag is set and the OAM Ethertype is present at the end of Flow Entropy:
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果设置了颤音警报标志并且OAM Ethertype出现在流熵的末尾：

contents.text: * Perform OAM processing.
contents.zh-CHS: * 执行OAM处理。

contents.text: - Else, extract the TRILL Header, inner MAC addresses, and Inner.VLAN, and pass indication (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, iVL and M3) to the TRILL RBridge layer.
contents.zh-CHS: - 否则，提取TRILL标头、内部MAC地址和inner.VLAN，并将指示（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、iVL和M3）传递给TRILL RBridge层。

contents.text: o If the DA is All-IS-IS-RBridges and the Ethertype is L2-IS-IS, then pass frame up to TRILL IS-IS processing.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA为All is RBRINGS且Ethertype为L2-is-is，则将帧传递给TRILL is-is处理。

contents.text: o If the DA is All-RBridges or All-IS-IS-RBridges but the Ethertype is not TRILL or L2-IS-IS respectively:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA为所有RBridges或所有is为RBridges，但Ethertype分别不是TRILL或L2-is-is：

contents.text: - Discard the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: - 丢弃这个包。

contents.text: o If the Ethertype is TRILL but the multicast DA is not All-RBridges or if the Ethertype is L2-IS-IS but the multicast DA is not All-IS-IS-RBridges:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果Ethertype为TRILL，但多播DA不是全部RBridges，或者如果Ethertype为L2-is-is，但多播DA不是全部is RBridges：

contents.text: - Discard the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: - 丢弃这个包。

contents.text: o If the DA is All-Edge-RBridges and the Ethertype is RBridge-Channel [RFC7178]:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA为所有边缘RBridges且Ethertype为RBridge通道[RFC7178]：

contents.text: - Process as a possible multicast native RBridge Channel packet.
contents.zh-CHS: - 作为可能的多播本机RBridge通道数据包进行处理。

contents.text: o If the DA is in the initial bridging/link protocols block (01-80-C2-00-00-00 to 01-80-C2-00-00-0F) or is in the TRILL block and not assigned for Outer.MacDA use (01-80-C2-00-00-42 to 01-80-C2-00-00-4F), then:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA位于初始桥接/链路协议块（01-80-C2-00-00至01-80-C2-00-00-0F）或TRILL块中，且未分配给外部MacDA使用（01-80-C2-00-00-42至01-80-C2-00-00-4F），则：

contents.text: - The frame is not propagated through an RBridge although some special processing may be done at the port as specified in [RFC6325], and the frame may be dispatched to Layer 2 processing at the port if certain protocols are supported by that port (examples include the Link Aggregation Protocol and the Link-Layer Discovery Protocol).
contents.zh-CHS: - 虽然可以在[RFC6325]中指定的端口处进行一些特殊处理，但帧不会通过RBridge传播，并且如果端口支持某些协议，则可以将帧发送到端口处的第2层处理（示例包括链路聚合协议和链路层发现协议）。

contents.text: o If the DA is some other multicast value:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果DA是其他多播值：

contents.text: - Insert TRILL-HDR and construct (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, IVL, M3).
contents.zh-CHS: - 插入TRILL-HDR并构建（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、IVL、M3）。

contents.text: - Pass the (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, IVL, M3) to the RBridge layer.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、IVL、M3）传输至RBridge层。

contents.text: 4.3.4. Transmit Processing of Multicast Packets
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.4. 多播数据包的传输处理

contents.text: The following ignores the case of transmitting TRILL IS-IS packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面忽略传输TRILL IS-IS数据包的情况。

contents.text: o Receive indication (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, iVL, M3) from the RBridge layer.
contents.zh-CHS: o 从RBridge层接收指示（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、iVL、M3）。

contents.text: o If the TRILL Header multicast ("M") flag is set, the TRILL-HDR Alert flag is set, and the OAM Ethertype is present, then:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果设置了TRILL标头多播（“M”）标志，设置了TRILL-HDR警报标志，并且存在OAM Ethertype，则：

contents.text: - Construct (DA, SA, V, M2) by inserting TRILL Outer.MacDA of All-RBridges, Outer.MacSA, Outer.VLAN, and TRILL Ethertype. M2 here is (Ethertype TRILL, TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, iVL, M).
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过插入所有RBridge、Outer.MacSA、Outer.VLAN和TRILL Ethertype的TRILL Outer.MacDA来构造（DA、SA、V、M2）。这里是M2（Ethertype TRILL，TRILL-HDR，iDA，iSA，iVL，M）。

contents.text: Note: A second copy of native format is not made.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：未制作本机格式的第二份副本。

contents.text: o Else, if the TRILL Header multicast ("M") flag is set and the Alert flag not set:
contents.zh-CHS: o 否则，如果设置了TRILL标头多播（“M”）标志，但未设置警报标志：

contents.text: - If the port is Appointed Forwarder for iVL and the port is not configured as a trunk port or a P2P port, strip TRILL-HDR, iSA, iDA, and iVL and construct (DA, SA, V, M2) for native format.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果该端口被指定为iVL的转发器，且该端口未配置为中继端口或P2P端口，则剥离TRILL-HDR、iSA、iDA和iVL，并构建（DA、SA、V、M2）本机格式。

contents.text: - Make a second copy (DA, SA, V, M2) by inserting TRILL Outer.MacDA, Outer.MacSA, Outer.VLAN, and TRILL Ethertype. M2 here is (Ethertype TRILL, TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, iVL, M).
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过插入TRILL Outer.MacDA、Outer.MacSA、Outer.VLAN和TRILL Ethertype创建第二个副本（DA、SA、V、M2）。这里是M2（Ethertype TRILL，TRILL-HDR，iDA，iSA，iVL，M）。

contents.text: o Pass the indication (DA, SA, V, M2) to the End-Station VLAN and Priority Processing layer.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将指示（DA、SA、V、M2）传递到终端站VLAN和优先级处理层。

contents.text: 4.4. TRILL OAM Layer Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 4.4. TRILL-OAM层处理

contents.text: The TRILL OAM layer is located between the TRILL Encapsulation/Decapsulation layer and the RBridge layer. It performs the following: 1) identifies OAM frames that need local processing and 2) performs OAM processing or redirects to the CPU for OAM processing.
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM层位于TRILL封装/去封装层和RBridge层之间。它执行以下操作：1）标识需要本地处理的OAM帧，2）执行OAM处理或重定向到CPU进行OAM处理。

contents.text: o Receive indication (TRILL-HDR, iDA, iSA, iVL, M3) from the RBridge layer. M3 is the payload after Inner.VLAN iVL.
contents.zh-CHS: o 从RBridge层接收指示（TRILL-HDR、iDA、iSA、iVL、M3）。M3是Inner.VLAN iVL之后的有效负载。

contents.text: o If the TRILL Header multicast ("M") flag is set, the TRILL Alert flag is set, and TRILL OAM Ethertype is present, then:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果设置了TRILL Header multicast（“M”）标志，设置了TRILL Alert标志，并且存在TRILL OAM Ethertype，则：

contents.text: - If MEP or MIP is configured on the Inner.VLAN/FGL of the packet, then:
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果在数据包的Inner.VLAN/FGL上配置了MEP或MIP，则：

contents.text: * Discard packets that have MD-Level less than that of the MEP or packets that do not have MD-Level present (e.g., due to packet truncation).
contents.zh-CHS: * 丢弃MD级别低于MEP的数据包或不存在MD级别的数据包（例如，由于数据包截断）。

contents.text: * If MD-Level matches MD-Level of the MEP, then:
contents.zh-CHS: * 若MD级别与MEP的MD级别匹配，则：

contents.text: + Redirect to OAM processing (Do not forward further).
contents.zh-CHS: + 重定向到OAM处理（不进一步转发）。

contents.text: * If MD-Level matches MD-Level of MIP, then:
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果MD级别与MIP的MD级别匹配，则：

contents.text: + Make a copy for OAM processing and continue.
contents.zh-CHS: + 为OAM处理制作一份副本并继续。

contents.text: * If MD-Level matches MD-Level of MEP, then:
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果MD级别与MEP的MD级别匹配，则：

contents.text: + Redirect the OAM packet to OAM processing and do not forward along or forward as a native packet.
contents.zh-CHS: + 将OAM数据包重定向到OAM处理，不要沿着或作为本机数据包转发。

contents.text: o Else, if the TRILL Alert flag is set and the TRILL OAM Ethertype is present, then:
contents.zh-CHS: o 否则，如果设置了颤音警报标志且颤音OAM Ethertype存在，则：

contents.text: - If MEP or MIP is configured on the Inner.VLAN/FGL of the packet, then:
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果在数据包的Inner.VLAN/FGL上配置了MEP或MIP，则：

contents.text: * Discard packets that have MD-Level not present or where MD-Level is less than that of the MEP.
contents.zh-CHS: * 丢弃MD级别不存在或MD级别低于MEP级别的数据包。

contents.text: * If MD-Level matches MD-Level of the MEP, then:
contents.zh-CHS: * 若MD级别与MEP的MD级别匹配，则：

contents.text: + Redirect to OAM processing (do not forward further).
contents.zh-CHS: + 重定向到OAM处理（不进一步转发）。

contents.text: * If MD-Level matches MD-Level of MIP, then:
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果MD级别与MIP的MD级别匹配，则：

contents.text: + Make a copy for OAM processing and continue.
contents.zh-CHS: + 为OAM处理制作一份副本并继续。

contents.text: o Else, for a non-OAM packet:
contents.zh-CHS: o 否则，对于非OAM数据包：

contents.text: - Continue.
contents.zh-CHS: - 持续

contents.text: o Pass the indication (DA, SA, V, M2) to the End-Station VLAN and Priority Processing layer.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将指示（DA、SA、V、M2）传递到终端站VLAN和优先级处理层。

contents.text: Note: In the receive path, the processing above compares with the Down MEP and MIP Half functions. In the transmit processing, it compares with Up MEP and MIP Half functions.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：在接收路径中，上述处理与Down MEP和MIP半功能进行比较。在发送处理方面，它与Up-MEP和MIP-Half函数进行了比较。

contents.text: Appointed Forwarder is a function that the TRILL Encapsulation/Decapsulation layer performs. The TRILL Encapsulation/Decapsulation layer is responsible for prevention of leaking of OAM packets as native frames.
contents.zh-CHS: 指定转发器是TRILL封装/去封装层执行的功能。TRILL封装/去封装层负责防止OAM数据包作为本机帧泄漏。

contents.text: 5. Maintenance Associations (MAs) in TRILL
contents.zh-CHS: 5. TRILL中的维护协会（MAs）

contents.text: [8021Q] defines a Maintenance Association as a logical relationship between a group of nodes. Each Maintenance Association (MA) is identified with a unique MAID of 48 bytes [8021Q]. CCM and other related OAM functions operate within the scope of an MA. The definition of MA is technology independent. Similarly, it is encoded within the OAM message, not in the technology-dependent portion of the packet. Hence, the MAID as defined in [8021Q] can be utilized for TRILL OAM without modifications. This also allows us to utilize CCM and LBM messages defined in [8021Q] as is.
contents.zh-CHS: [8021Q]将维护关联定义为一组节点之间的逻辑关系。每个维护关联（MA）由48字节的唯一MAID标识[8021Q]。CCM和其他相关OAM功能在MA的范围内运行。MA的定义与技术无关。类似地，它被编码在OAM消息中，而不是在分组的技术依赖部分中。因此，[8021Q]中定义的MAID可用于TRILL OAM，无需修改。这也允许我们按原样利用[8021Q]中定义的CCM和LBM消息。

contents.text: In TRILL, an MA may contain two or more RBridges (MEPs). For unicast, it is likely that the MA contains exactly two MEPs that are the two end points of the flow. For multicast, the MA may contain two or more MEPs.
contents.zh-CHS: 在TRILL中，MA可以包含两个或多个rbridge（mep）。对于单播，MA可能正好包含两个mep，这两个mep是流的两个端点。对于多播，MA可以包含两个或多个mep。

contents.text: For TRILL, in addition to all of the standard [8021Q] CFM MIB definitions, each MEP's MIB contains one or more Flow Entropy definitions corresponding to the set of flows that the MEP monitors.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于TRILL，除了所有标准[8021Q]CFM MIB定义外，每个MEP的MIB还包含一个或多个与MEP监控的流集相对应的流熵定义。

contents.text: [8021Q] CFM MIB is augmented to add the TRILL-specific information. Figure 5 depicts the augmentation of the CFM MIB to add the TRILL-specific Flow Entropy.
contents.zh-CHS: [8021Q]CFM MIB被扩充以添加特定于颤音的信息。图5描述了CFM MIB的增强，以添加特定于颤音的流熵。

contents.text:
MA---
|
 --- MEP
|
. - Remote MEP List
       .
       |
        --- MEP-A
       |
        --- MEP-B
       .
| . - Flow Entropy List { Augments IEEE8021-CFM-MIB}
contents.zh-CHS: | . - 流熵表{扩充IEEE8021-CFM-MIB}

contents.text:
|
         --- (Flow Entropy-1)
        |
         --- (Flow Entropy-2)
        |
        . --- (Flow Entropy-n)
|
 Other MIB entries
Figure 5: Correlation of TRILL-Augmented MIB
contents.zh-CHS: 图5：颤音增强MIB的相关性

contents.text: The detailed TRILL OAM MIB will be specified in a separate document [TRILLOAMMIB].
contents.zh-CHS: 详细的TRILL OAM MIB将在单独的文档[TrilloamIB]中指定。

contents.text: 6. MEP Addressing
contents.zh-CHS: 6. MEP寻址

contents.text: In IEEE CFM [8021Q], OAM messages address the target MEP by utilizing a unique MAC address. In TRILL, a MEP is addressed by a combination of the egress RBridge nickname and the Inner.VLAN/FGL.
contents.zh-CHS: 在IEEE CFM[8021Q]中，OAM消息通过使用唯一的MAC地址来寻址目标MEP。在TRILL中，通过出口RBridge昵称和Inner.VLAN/FGL的组合来寻址MEP。

contents.text: Additionally, MEPs are represented by a 2-octet MEP-ID that is independent of the underlying technology. In CFM [8021Q], the value of MEP-ID is restricted to the range of 1 to 8191. However, on a CFM [8021Q] packet, MEP-IDs are encoded as a 2-octet field. In the TRILL Base Mode operation presented in Appendix B, MEP-IDs are mapped 1-to-1 with the RBridge nicknames. Hence, in TRILL, a MEP-ID MUST be a number in the range from 1 to 65535.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，MEP由独立于底层技术的2-octet MEP-ID表示。在CFM[8021Q]中，MEP-ID的值限制在1到8191的范围内。然而，在CFM[8021Q]数据包上，MEP ID被编码为2个八位组字段。在附录B中介绍的颤音基本模式操作中，MEP ID与RBridge昵称一一对应。因此，在TRILL中，MEP-ID必须是介于1到65535之间的数字。

contents.text: At the MEP, OAM packets go through a hierarchy of OpCode demultiplexers. The OpCode demultiplexers channel the incoming OAM packets to the appropriate message processor (e.g., LBM). Refer to Figure 6 for a visual depiction of these different demultiplexers.
contents.zh-CHS: 在MEP，OAM数据包通过操作码解复用器的层次结构。操作码解复用器将传入的OAM数据包传送到适当的消息处理器（例如LBM）。有关这些不同解复用器的视觉描述，请参阅图6。

contents.text: The demultiplexing sequence is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 解复用序列如下所示：

contents.text: 1. Identify the packets that need OAM processing at the local RBridge as specified in Section 4.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 按照第4节的规定，识别需要在本地RBridge进行OAM处理的数据包。

contents.text: a. Identify the MEP that is associated with the Inner.VLAN/FGL.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 标识与Inner.VLAN/FGL关联的MEP。

contents.text: 2. The MEP first validates the MD-Level and then:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. MEP首先验证MD级别，然后：

contents.text: a. Redirects to the MD-Level demultiplexer.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 重定向到MD级解复用器。

contents.text: 3. The MD-Level demultiplexer compares the MD-Level of the packet against the MD-Level of the local MEPs of a given MD-Level on the port. (Note: there can be more than one MEP at the same MD-Level but they belong to different MAs.)
contents.zh-CHS: 3. MD级别解复用器将数据包的MD级别与端口上给定MD级别的本地MEP的MD级别进行比较。（注：同一MD级别上可能有多个MEP，但它们属于不同的MAs。）

contents.text: a. If the packet MD-Level is equal to the configured MD-Level of the MEP, then pass to the OpCode demultiplexer.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 如果数据包MD级别等于MEP配置的MD级别，则传递到操作码解复用器。

contents.text: b. If the packet MD-Level is less than the configured MD-Level of the MEP, discard the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: b. 如果数据包MD级别低于MEP配置的MD级别，则丢弃该数据包。

contents.text: c. If the packet MD-Level is greater than the configured MD-Level of the MEP, then pass on to the next-higher MD-Level demultiplexer, if available. Otherwise, if no such higher MD-Level demultiplexer exists, then forward the packet as normal data.
contents.zh-CHS: c. 如果数据包MD级别大于MEP配置的MD级别，则传递到下一个更高的MD级别解复用器（如果可用）。否则，如果不存在此类更高MD级别的解复用器，则将数据包作为正常数据转发。

contents.text: 4. The OpCode demultiplexer compares the OpCode in the packet with supported OpCodes.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 操作码解复用器将数据包中的操作码与支持的操作码进行比较。

contents.text: a. If the OpCode is CCM, LBM, LBR, PTM, PTR, MTVM, or MTVR, then pass on to the correct processor.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 如果操作码是CCM、LBM、LBR、PTM、PTR、MTVM或MTVR，则传递到正确的处理器。

contents.text: b. If the OpCode is unknown, then discard.
contents.zh-CHS: b. 如果操作码未知，则放弃。

contents.text:
|
            .CCM   LBM   PTM   MTVM . .
            |      |    |      |
          +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
          |        OP Code DE-Mux |--- Unknown
          +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
            ^       ^          ^
  MD==Li    |       |          |
         +-+-+   +-+-+      +-+-+
         | L |-->|L2 |-.-   |Ln |---- >
         +-+-+   +-+-+      +-+-+      |
          |  ^    |          |         |
  MD<LI Drop |    Drop       Drop      |
             |                         |
  MD not --- |TRILL OAM need local     |
  Present    | Processing              |
             |                         |
TRILL Data   ----  TRILL Data         ----
   ------->| T  |----------------- >|  M |--- >
+ TRILL OAM  ----  + pass through OAM ----
Figure 6: OAM Demultiplexers at MEP for Active SAP
contents.zh-CHS: 图6:MEP处活动SAP的OAM解复用器

contents.text: o T: Denotes Tap. Identifies OAM frames that need local processing. These are the packets with the Alert flag set and OAM Ethertype present after the Flow Entropy of the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: o T:表示抽头。标识需要本地处理的OAM帧。这些是在数据包的流熵之后设置了警报标志和OAM Ethertype的数据包。

contents.text: o M: The post-processing merge that merges data and OAM messages that are passed through. Additionally, the merge component ensures, as explained earlier, that OAM packets are not forwarded out as native frames.
contents.zh-CHS: o M：后处理合并，合并通过的数据和OAM消息。此外，如前所述，合并组件确保OAM数据包不会作为本机帧转发出去。

contents.text: o L: Denotes MD-Level processing. Packets whose MD-Level is less than the MD-Level of the current processing step will be dropped. Packets with equal MD-Levels are passed on to the OpCode demultiplexer. Others are passed on to the next-level MD processors or eventually to the merge point (M).
contents.zh-CHS: o L：表示MD级处理。MD级别低于当前处理步骤MD级别的数据包将被丢弃。具有相同MD级别的数据包被传递到操作码解复用器。其他的被传递到下一级MD处理器，或最终传递到合并点（M）。

contents.text: NOTE: LBM, LBR, MTVM, MTVR, PTM, and PTR are not subject to MA demultiplexers. These packets do not have an MA encoded in the packet. Adequate response can be generated to these packets, without loss of functionality, by any of the MEPs present on that interface or an entity within the RBridge.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：LBM、LBR、MTVM、MTVR、PTM和PTR不受MA解复用器的影响。这些数据包中没有MA编码。接口上的任何MEP或RBridge中的实体都可以对这些数据包生成足够的响应，而不会丢失功能。

contents.text: 6.1. Use of MIP in TRILL
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1. MIP在颤音中的应用

contents.text: Maintenance Intermediate Points (MIPs) are mainly used for fault isolation. Link Trace Messages in [8021Q] utilize a well-known multicast MAC address, and MIPs generate responses to Link Trace Messages. Response to Link Trace Messages or lack thereof can be used for fault isolation in TRILL.
contents.zh-CHS: 维修中间点（MIPs）主要用于故障隔离。[8021Q]中的链路跟踪消息利用众所周知的多播MAC地址，MIPs生成对链路跟踪消息的响应。对链路跟踪消息的响应或缺少链路跟踪消息可用于TRILL中的故障隔离。

contents.text: As explained in Section 10, a Hop Count expiry approach will be utilized for fault isolation and path tracing. The approach is very similar to the well-known IP trace-route approach. Hence, explicit addressing of MIPs is not required for the purpose of fault isolation.
contents.zh-CHS: 如第10节所述，跳数到期方法将用于故障隔离和路径跟踪。该方法与众所周知的IP跟踪路由方法非常相似。因此，出于故障隔离的目的，不需要对MIPs进行显式寻址。

contents.text: Any given RBridge can have multiple MIPs located within an interface. As such, a mechanism is required to identify which MIP should respond to an incoming OAM message. Any MIP residing within the ingress interface may reply to the incoming Path Trace Message without loss of functionality or information. As specified in Section 3.4, the address of the responding RBridge can be identified by means of the Sender ID TLV (1). The Reply Ingress TLV (5) identifies the interface id. The combination of these allows the recipient of the response to uniquely identify the responder.
contents.zh-CHS: 任何给定的RBridge都可以在一个接口中有多个MIP。因此，需要一种机制来识别哪个MIP应该响应传入的OAM消息。驻留在入口接口内的任何MIP都可以在不丢失功能或信息的情况下回复传入的路径跟踪消息。如第3.4节所述，可通过发送方ID TLV（1）识别响应RBridge的地址。应答入口TLV（5）标识接口id。这些组合允许应答接收者唯一标识应答者。

contents.text: A similar approach to that presented above for MEPs can be used for MIP processing. It is important to note that "M", the merge block of a MIP, does not prevent OAM packets leaking out as native frames. On edge interfaces, MEPs MUST be configured to prevent the leaking of TRILL OAM packets out of the TRILL campus.
contents.zh-CHS: MIP处理可以使用与上述MEP类似的方法。重要的是要注意，MIP的合并块“M”不能防止OAM数据包作为本机帧泄漏。在边缘接口上，必须配置MEP以防止TRILL OAM数据包泄漏到TRILL园区之外。

contents.text: Figure 7: OAM Demultiplexers at MIP for Active SAP
contents.zh-CHS: 图7:MIP处用于活动SAP的OAM解复用器

contents.text: o T: Tap processing for MIP. All packets with the TRILL Header Alert flag set are captured.
contents.zh-CHS: o T:MIP的点击处理。将捕获设置了TRILL标头警报标志的所有数据包。

contents.text: o L: MD-Level Processing. Packets with matching MD-Levels are "copied" to the OpCode demultiplexer, and the original packet is passed on to the next MD-Level processor. Other packets are simply passed on to the next MD-Level processor without copying to the OpCode demultiplexer.
contents.zh-CHS: o L:MD级处理。具有匹配MD级别的数据包被“复制”到操作码解复用器，原始数据包被传递到下一个MD级别处理器。其他数据包只传递到下一个MD级处理器，而不复制到操作码解复用器。

contents.text: o M: The intermediate point processing merge that merges data and OAM messages that are passed through.
contents.zh-CHS: o M：中间点处理合并，合并通过的数据和OAM消息。

contents.text: Packets that carry Path Trace Message (PTM) or Multi-destination Tree Verification Message (MTVM) OpCodes are passed on to the respective processors.
contents.zh-CHS: 携带路径跟踪消息（PTM）或多目标树验证消息（MTVM）操作码的数据包被传递到相应的处理器。

contents.text: Packets with unknown OpCodes are counted and discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 具有未知操作码的数据包被计数并丢弃。

contents.text: 7. Continuity Check Message (CCM)
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 连续性检查消息（CCM）

contents.text: CCMs are used to monitor connectivity and configuration errors. [8021Q] monitors connectivity by listening to periodic CCM messages received from its remote MEP partners in the MA. An [8021Q] MEP identifies cross-connect errors by comparing the MAID in the received CCM message with the MEP's local MAID. The MAID [8021Q] is a 48-byte field that is technology independent. Similarly, the MEP-ID is a
contents.zh-CHS: CCM用于监控连接和配置错误。[8021Q]通过监听从其在MA中的远程MEP合作伙伴接收的周期性CCM消息来监控连接性。[8021Q]MEP通过将接收到的CCM消息中的MAID与MEP的本地MAID进行比较来识别交叉连接错误。MAID[8021Q]是一个48字节的字段，与技术无关。同样，MEP-ID是一个

contents.text: 2-byte field that is independent of the technology. Given this generic definition of CCM fields, CCM as defined in [8021Q] can be utilized in TRILL with no changes. TRILL-specific information may be carried in CCMs when encoded using TRILL-specific TLVs or sub-TLVs. This is possible since CCMs may carry optional TLVs.
contents.zh-CHS: 独立于技术的2字节字段。鉴于CCM字段的这种通用定义，[8021Q]中定义的CCM可以在颤音中使用，无需更改。当使用特定于颤音的TLV或子TLV编码时，特定于颤音的信息可以在CCMs中携带。这是可能的，因为CCM可能携带可选的TLV。

contents.text: Unlike classical Ethernet environments, TRILL contains multipath forwarding. The path taken by a packet depends on the payload of the packet. The Maintenance Association (MA) identifies the interested Maintenance End Points (MEPs) of a given monitored path. For unicast, there are only two MEPs per MA. For multicast, there can be two or more MEPs in the MA. The entropy values of the monitored flows are defined within the MA. CCM transmit logic will utilize these Flow Entropy values when constructing the CCM packets. Please see Section 12 for the theory of operation of CCM.
contents.zh-CHS: 与传统以太网环境不同，TRILL包含多路径转发。数据包所采用的路径取决于数据包的有效载荷。维护关联（MA）识别给定监控路径的相关维护端点（MEP）。对于单播，每MA只有两个mep。对于多播，MA中可以有两个或多个MEP。监测流量的熵值在MA中定义。CCM传输逻辑在构造CCM包时将利用这些流熵值。关于CCM的运行原理，请参见第12节。

contents.text: The MIB in [8021Q] is augmented with the definition of Flow Entropy. Please see [TRILLOAMMIB] for this and other TRILL-related OAM MIB definitions. Figure 8 depicts the correlation between MA, CCM, and the Flow Entropy.
contents.zh-CHS: [8021Q]中的MIB增加了流熵的定义。有关此定义和其他与TRILL相关的OAM MIB定义，请参见[TrilloamIB]。图8描述了MA、CCM和流量熵之间的相关性。

contents.text:
MA---
|
 --- MEP
|
. - Remote MEP List
       .
       |
        --- MEP-A
       |
        --- MEP-B
       .
| . - Flow Entropy List {Augments IEEE8021-CFM-MIB}
contents.zh-CHS: | . - 流熵表{扩充IEEE8021-CFM-MIB}

contents.text:
|
         --- (Flow Entropy-1)
        |
         --- (Flow Entropy-2)
        |
        . ---(Flow Entropy-n)
|
. - CCM
       |
        --- (standard 8021ag entries)
       |
        --- (Hop Count) { Augments IEEE8021-CFM-MIB}
       |
        --- (Any other TRILL OAM-specific entries)
                                        {Augmented}
|
.
|
 - Other MIB entries
Figure 8: Augmentation of CCM MIB in TRILL
contents.zh-CHS: 图8:TRILL中CCM MIB的扩充

contents.text: In a multi-pathing environment, a flow, by definition, is unidirectional. A question may arise as to what Flow Entropy should be used in the response. CCMs are unidirectional and have no explicit reply; as such, the issue of the response Flow Entropy does not arise. In the transmitted CCM, each MEP reports local status using the Remote Defect Indication (RDI) flag. Additionally, a MEP may raise SNMP TRAPs [TRILLOAMMIB] as alarms when a connectivity failure occurs.
contents.zh-CHS: 在多路径环境中，根据定义，流是单向的。可能会出现一个问题，即响应中应该使用什么样的流熵。CCM是单向的，没有明确的回复；因此，不会出现响应流熵的问题。在传输的CCM中，每个MEP使用远程缺陷指示（RDI）标志报告本地状态。此外，当发生连接故障时，MEP可能会发出SNMP陷阱[TRILLOAMMIB]作为警报。

contents.text: 8. TRILL OAM Message Channel
contents.zh-CHS: 8. TRILL-OAM消息通道

contents.text: The TRILL OAM Message Channel can be divided into two parts: TRILL OAM message header and TRILL OAM TLVs. Every OAM message MUST contain a single TRILL OAM message header and a set of one or more specified OAM message TLVs.
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL-OAM消息通道可分为两部分：TRILL-OAM消息头和TRILL-OAM TLV。每个OAM消息必须包含一个TRILL OAM消息头和一组一个或多个指定的OAM消息TLV。

contents.text: 8.1. TRILL OAM Message Header
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1. TRILL OAM消息头

contents.text: As discussed earlier, a common messaging framework between [8021Q], TRILL, and other similar standards such as Y.1731 is accomplished by reusing the OAM message header defined in [8021Q].
contents.zh-CHS: 如前所述，[8021Q]、TRILL和其他类似标准（如Y.1731）之间的公共消息传递框架是通过重用[8021Q]中定义的OAM消息头来实现的。

contents.text: Figure 9: OAM Message Format
contents.zh-CHS: 图9:OAM消息格式

contents.text: o MD-L: Maintenance Domain Level (3 bits). For TRILL, in general, this field is set to a single value across the TRILL campus. When using the TRILL Base Mode as specified in Appendix B, MD-L is set to 3. However, extension of TRILL (for example, to support multilevel) may create different MD-Levels, and the MD-L field must be appropriately set in those scenarios. (Please refer to [8021Q] for the definition of MD-Level).
contents.zh-CHS: o MD-L：维护域级别（3位）。对于TRILL，通常，此字段设置为整个TRILL校园中的单个值。当使用附录B中规定的颤音基本模式时，MD-L设置为3。但是，TRILL的扩展（例如，支持多级）可能会创建不同的MD级别，并且在这些场景中必须适当设置MD-L字段。（MD级别的定义请参考[8021Q]）。

contents.text: o Version: Indicates the version (5 bits) as specified in [8021Q]. This document does not require changing the Version defined in [8021Q].
contents.zh-CHS: o 版本：表示[8021Q]中规定的版本（5位）。本文件不需要更改[8021Q]中定义的版本。

contents.text: o OpCode: Operation Code (8 bits). Specifies the operation performed by the message. See Section 8.2.
contents.zh-CHS: o 操作码：操作码（8位）。指定消息执行的操作。见第8.2节。

contents.text: o Flags: Includes operational flags (1 byte). The definition of flags is OpCode-specific and is covered in the applicable sections.
contents.zh-CHS: o 标志：包括操作标志（1字节）。标志的定义是特定于操作码的，并在适用章节中介绍。

contents.text: o FirstTLVOffset: Defines the location of the first TLV, in bytes, starting from the end of the FirstTLVOffset field (1 byte). (Refer to [8021Q] for the definition of the FirstTLVOffset.)
contents.zh-CHS: o FirstTLVOffset：定义第一个TLV的位置，以字节为单位，从FirstTLVOffset字段（1字节）的末尾开始。（有关FirstTLVOffset的定义，请参阅[8021Q]）

contents.text: o OpCode-Specific Information: May contain Session Identification Number, timestamp, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: o 操作码特定信息：可能包含会话标识号、时间戳等。

contents.text: The MD-L, Version, OpCode, Flags, and FirstTLVOffset fields collectively are referred to as the OAM message header.
contents.zh-CHS: MD-L、版本、操作码、标志和FirstTLVOffset字段统称为OAM消息头。

contents.text: 8.2. TRILL-Specific OAM OpCodes
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2. 特定于TRILL的OAM操作码

contents.text: The following TRILL-specific CFM OpCodes are defined. Each of the OpCodes indicates a separate type of TRILL OAM message. Details of the messages are presented in Sections 10 and 11.
contents.zh-CHS: 定义了以下特定于颤音的CFM操作码。每个操作码都表示一种单独的TRILL OAM消息类型。第10节和第11节介绍了这些信息的详细信息。

contents.text: TRILL OAM message OpCodes:
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM消息操作码：

contents.text: 64: Path Trace Reply 65: Path Trace Message 66: Multi-destination Tree Verification Reply 67: Multi-destination Tree Verification Message
contents.zh-CHS: 64:路径跟踪回复65:路径跟踪消息66:多目标树验证回复67:多目标树验证消息

contents.text: Loopback and CCM Messages reuse the OpCodes defined by [8021Q].
contents.zh-CHS: 环回和CCM消息重用[8021Q]定义的操作码。

contents.text: 8.3. Format of TRILL OAM TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.3. TRILL OAM TLV格式

contents.text: The same CFM TLV format as defined in [8021Q] is used for TRILL OAM. The following figure depicts the general format of a TRILL OAM TLV:
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM使用[8021Q]中定义的相同CFM TLV格式。下图描述了TRILL OAM TLV的一般格式：

contents.text: Figure 10: TRILL OAM TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图10：TRILL OAM TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): Specifies the type of the TLV (see Section 8.4 for TLV types).
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：指定TLV的类型（TLV类型见第8.4节）。

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): Specifies the length of the Value field in octets. Length of the Value field can be zero or more octets.
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：以八位字节为单位指定值字段的长度。值字段的长度可以是零个或多个八位字节。

contents.text: o Value (variable): The length and the content of this field depend on the type of TLV. Please refer to applicable TLV definitions for details.
contents.zh-CHS: o 值（变量）：此字段的长度和内容取决于TLV的类型。有关详细信息，请参考适用的TLV定义。

contents.text: Semantics and usage of Type values allocated for TRILL OAM purpose are defined by this document and other future related documents.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档和其他未来相关文档定义了为TRILL OAM目的分配的类型值的语义和用法。

contents.text: 8.4. TRILL OAM TLVs
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4. TRILL-OAM TLV

contents.text: TRILL-related TLVs are defined in this section. TLVS defined in [8021Q] are reused, where applicable.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了与颤音相关的TLV。[8021Q]中定义的TLV在适用时可重复使用。

contents.text: 8.4.1. Common TLVs between CFM and TRILL
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.1. CFM和TRILL之间的通用TLV

contents.text: The following TLVs are defined in [8021Q]. We reuse them where applicable. The format and semantics of the TLVs are as defined in [8021Q].
contents.zh-CHS: [8021Q]中定义了以下TLV。我们在适用的地方重用它们。TLV的格式和语义如[8021Q]中所定义。

contents.text:
Type   Name of TLV in [8021Q]
----   ----------------------
  0    End TLV
  1    Sender ID TLV
  2    Port Status TLV
  3    Data TLV
  4    Interface Status TLV
  5    Reply Ingress TLV
  6    Reply Egress TLV
  7    LTM Egress Identifier TLV
  8    LTR Egress Identifier TLV
  9-30 Reserved
  31   Organization Specific TLV
8.4.2. TRILL OAM-Specific TLVs
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.2. TRILL OAM专用TLV

contents.text: Listed below is a summary of TRILL OAM TLVs and their corresponding codes. Format and semantics of TRILL OAM TLVs are defined in subsequent sections.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面列出的是TRILL OAM TLV及其相应代码的摘要。TRILL OAM TLV的格式和语义将在后续章节中定义。

contents.text:
Type         TLV Name
----         ------------------------------------
64           TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV
65           Out-of-Band Reply Address TLV
66           Diagnostic Label TLV
67           Original Data Payload TLV
68           RBridge Scope TLV
69           Previous RBridge Nickname TLV
70           Next-Hop RBridge List TLV
71           Multicast Receiver Port Count TLV
72           Flow Identifier TLV
73           Reflector Entropy TLV
74           Authentication TLV
The TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV (64) MUST be the first TLV. An End TLV (0) MUST be included as the last TLV. All other TLVs can be included in any order.
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV（64）必须是第一个TLV。必须将结束TLV（0）作为最后一个TLV包括在内。所有其他TLV可按任何顺序包含。

contents.text: 8.4.3. TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.3. TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV

contents.text: The TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV carries information specific to TRILL OAM applications. The TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV MUST always be present and MUST be the first TLV in TRILL OAM messages. Messages that do not include the TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV as the first TLV MUST be discarded by a TRILL MP.
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL-OAM应用程序标识符TLV携带特定于TRILL-OAM应用程序的信息。TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV必须始终存在，并且必须是TRILL OAM消息中的第一个TLV。TRILL MP必须丢弃未将TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV作为第一个TLV的消息。

contents.text: Figure 11: TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图11:TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 64, TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位字节）：64，TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): 9
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：9

contents.text: o Version (1 octet): Currently set to zero. Indicates the TRILL OAM version. The TRILL OAM version can be different than the [8021Q] version.
contents.zh-CHS: o 版本（1个八位组）：当前设置为零。指示TRILL OAM版本。TRILL OAM版本可能不同于[8021Q]版本。

contents.text: o Reserved1 (3 octets): Set to zero on transmission and ignored on reception.
contents.zh-CHS: o Reserved1（3个八位字节）：传输时设置为零，接收时忽略。

contents.text: o Fragment-ID (1 octet): Indicates the fragment number of the current message. This applies only to reply messages; in request messages, it must be set to zero on transmission and ignored on receipt. The "F" flag defined below MUST be set with the final message, whether it is the last fragment of the fragmented message or the only message of the reply. Section 13 provides more details on OAM message fragmentation.
contents.zh-CHS: o 片段ID（1个八位组）：表示当前消息的片段编号。这仅适用于回复消息；在请求消息中，必须在传输时将其设置为零，在接收时将其忽略。下面定义的“F”标志必须与最终消息一起设置，无论它是分段消息的最后一个片段还是回复的唯一消息。第13节提供了有关OAM消息分段的更多详细信息。

contents.text: o Return Code (1 octet): Set to zero on requests. Set to an appropriate value in response messages.
contents.zh-CHS: o 返回代码（1个八位字节）：请求时设置为零。在响应消息中设置为适当的值。

contents.text: o Return Sub-code (1 octet): Set to zero on transmission of request message. The Return Sub-code identifies categories within a specific Return Code and MUST be interpreted within a Return Code.
contents.zh-CHS: o 返回子代码（1个八位字节）：在传输请求消息时设置为零。退货子代码标识特定退货代码中的类别，必须在退货代码中进行解释。

contents.text: o Reserved2 (12 bits): Set to zero on transmission and ignored on reception.
contents.zh-CHS: o Reserved2（12位）：传输时设置为零，接收时忽略。

contents.text: o F (1 bit): Final flag. When set, indicates this is the last response.
contents.zh-CHS: o F（1位）：最终标志。设置时，表示这是最后一次响应。

contents.text: o C (1 bit): Cross-Connect Error flag (VLAN/FGL mapping error). If set, indicates that the label (VLAN/FGL) in the Flow Entropy is different than the label included in the Diagnostic Label TLV. This field is ignored in request messages and MUST only be interpreted in response messages.
contents.zh-CHS: o C（1位）：交叉连接错误标志（VLAN/FGL映射错误）。如果设置，则表示流熵中的标签（VLAN/FGL）不同于诊断标签TLV中包含的标签。此字段在请求消息中被忽略，只能在响应消息中解释。

contents.text: o O (1 bit): If set, indicates OAM out-of-band response requested.
contents.zh-CHS: o O（1位）：如果设置，则表示请求的OAM带外响应。

contents.text: o I (1 bit): If set, indicates OAM in-band response requested.
contents.zh-CHS: o I（1位）：如果设置，则表示请求的OAM带内响应。

contents.text: NOTE: When both O and I bits are set to zero, this indicates that no response is required (silent mode). Users MAY specify both O and I, one of them, or none. When both O and I bits are set, the response is sent both in-band and out-of-band.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：当O和I位都设置为零时，这表示不需要响应（静默模式）。用户可以同时指定O和I、其中一个或无。当同时设置O和I位时，响应将在带内和带外发送。

contents.text: 8.4.4. Out-of-Band Reply Address TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.4. 带外应答地址TLV

contents.text: The Out-of-Band Reply Address TLV specifies the address to which an out-of-band OAM reply message MUST be sent. When the O bit in the TRILL Version sub-TLV (Section 3.3) is not set, the Out-of-Band Reply Address TLV is ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 带外应答地址TLV指定带外OAM应答消息必须发送到的地址。当TRILL版本子TLV（第3.3节）中的O位未设置时，带外回复地址TLV将被忽略。

contents.text: Figure 12: Out-of-Band Reply Address TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图12：带外回复地址TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 65, Out-of-Band Reply Address TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：65，带外应答地址TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): Variable. Minimum length is 2 + the length (in octets) of the shortest address. Currently, the minimum value of this field is 4, but this could change in the future if a new address shorter than the TRILL nickname is defined.
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：可变。最小长度为2+最短地址的长度（以八位字节为单位）。目前，该字段的最小值为4，但如果定义了一个短于颤音昵称的新地址，则将来可能会发生变化。

contents.text: o Address Type (1 octet):
contents.zh-CHS: o 地址类型（1个八位字节）：

contents.text: 0 - IPv4
contents.zh-CHS: 0-IPv4

contents.text: 1 - IPv6
contents.zh-CHS: 1-IPv6

contents.text: 2 - TRILL nickname
contents.zh-CHS: 2-颤音昵称

contents.text: All other values reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留所有其他值。

contents.text: o Addr Length (1 octet): Depends on the Address Type. Currently, defined values are:
contents.zh-CHS: o 地址长度（1个八位字节）：取决于地址类型。目前，定义的值为：

contents.text: 4 - IPv4
contents.zh-CHS: 4-IPv4

contents.text: 16 - IPv6
contents.zh-CHS: 16-IPv6

contents.text: 2 - TRILL nickname
contents.zh-CHS: 2-颤音昵称

contents.text: Other lengths may be acceptable for future Address Types.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于未来的地址类型，可以接受其他长度。

contents.text: o Reply Address (variable): Address where the reply needs to be sent. Length depends on the address specification.
contents.zh-CHS: o 回复地址（变量）：需要发送回复的地址。长度取决于地址规范。

contents.text: 8.4.5. Diagnostic Label TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.5. 诊断标签TLV

contents.text: The Diagnostic Label TLV specifies the data label (VLAN or FGL) in which the OAM messages are generated. Receiving RBridge MUST compare the data label of the Flow Entropy to the data label specified in the Diagnostic Label TLV. The "C" flag (Cross Connect Error) in the response (TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV; Section 8.4.3) MUST be set when the two VLANs do not match.
contents.zh-CHS: 诊断标签TLV指定生成OAM消息的数据标签（VLAN或FGL）。接收RBridge必须将流量熵的数据标签与诊断标签TLV中指定的数据标签进行比较。当两个VLAN不匹配时，必须设置响应（TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV；第8.4.3节）中的“C”标志（交叉连接错误）。

contents.text: Figure 13: Diagnostic Label TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图13：诊断标签TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 66, Diagnostic Label TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：66，诊断标签TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): 5
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：5

contents.text: o L-Type (1 octet): Label type
contents.zh-CHS: o L型（1个八位组）：标签型

contents.text: 0 - Indicates a right-justified 802.1Q 12-bit VLAN padded on the left with bits that must be sent as zero and ignored on receipt
contents.zh-CHS: 0-表示一个右对齐的802.1Q 12位VLAN，在左侧填充位，这些位必须作为零发送，并在接收时忽略

contents.text: 1 - Indicates a TRILL 24-bit fine-grained label
contents.zh-CHS: 1-表示颤音24位细粒度标签

contents.text: o Reserved (1 octet): Set to zero on transmission and ignored on reception.
contents.zh-CHS: o 保留（1个八位组）：传输时设置为零，接收时忽略。

contents.text: o Label (24 bits): Either 12-bit VLAN or 24 bit fine-grained label.
contents.zh-CHS: o 标签（24位）：12位VLAN或24位细粒度标签。

contents.text: RBridges do not perform label error checking when the Diagnostic Label TLV is not included in the OAM message. In certain deployments, intermediate devices may perform label translation. In such scenarios, the originator should not include the Diagnostic Label TLV in OAM messages. Inclusion of Diagnostic Label TLV will generate unwanted label error notifications.
contents.zh-CHS: 当OAM消息中未包含诊断标签TLV时，RBridges不执行标签错误检查。在某些部署中，中间设备可以执行标签转换。在这种情况下，发起人不应在OAM消息中包含诊断标签TLV。包含诊断标签TLV将生成不需要的标签错误通知。

contents.text: 8.4.6. Original Data Payload TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.6. 原始数据有效载荷TLV

contents.text: Figure 14: Original Data Payload TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图14：原始数据有效负载TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 67, Original Data Payload TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：67，原始数据有效载荷TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): variable
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：可变

contents.text: o Original Payload: The original TRILL Header and Flow Entropy. Used in constructing replies to the Loopback Message (see Section 9) and the Path Trace Message (see Section 10).
contents.zh-CHS: o 原始有效载荷：原始颤音标题和流熵。用于构造对环回消息（参见第9节）和路径跟踪消息（参见第10节）的回复。

contents.text: 8.4.7. RBridge Scope TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.7. RBridge示波器

contents.text: The RBridge Scope TLV identifies nicknames of RBridges from which a response is required. The RBridge Scope TLV is only applicable to Multi-destination Tree Verification Messages. This TLV SHOULD NOT be included in other messages. Receiving RBridges MUST ignore this TLV on messages other than Multi-destination Tree Verification Messages.
contents.zh-CHS: RBridge作用域TLV标识需要响应的RBridge的昵称。RBridge作用域TLV仅适用于多目标树验证消息。此TLV不应包含在其他消息中。接收RBridges必须忽略除多目标树验证消息之外的消息上的此TLV。

contents.text: Each TLV can contain up to 255 nicknames of in-scope RBridges. A Multi-destination Tree Verification Message may contain multiple RBridge scope TLVs, in the event that more than 255 in-scope RBridges need to be specified.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个TLV最多可以包含255个作用域内RBridges的昵称。如果需要指定超过255个范围内RBridge，则多目标树验证消息可能包含多个RBridge范围TLV。

contents.text: Absence of the RBridge Scope TLV indicates that a response is needed from all the RBridges. Please see Section 11 for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 缺少RBridge作用域TLV表示需要所有RBridge的响应。详情请参见第11节。

contents.text: Figure 15: RBridge Scope TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图15:RBridge范围TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 68, RBridge Scope TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：68，RBridge范围TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): Variable. Minimum value is 1.
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：可变。最小值为1。

contents.text: o nOfnicknames (1 octet): Indicates the number of nicknames included in this TLV. Zero (0) indicates no nicknames are included in the TLV. When this field is set to zero (0), the Length field MUST be set to 1.
contents.zh-CHS: o nOfnicknames（1个八位组）：表示此TLV中包含的昵称数。零（0）表示TLV中不包含昵称。当此字段设置为零（0）时，长度字段必须设置为1。

contents.text: o Nickname (2 octets): 16-bit RBridge nickname
contents.zh-CHS: o 昵称（2个八位字节）：16位RBridge昵称

contents.text: 8.4.8. Previous RBridge Nickname TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.8. 以前的RBridge昵称TLV

contents.text: The Previous RBridge Nickname TLV identifies the nickname or nicknames of the previous RBridge. [RFC6325] allows a given RBridge to hold multiple nicknames.
contents.zh-CHS: 前一个RBridge昵称TLV标识前一个RBridge的一个或多个昵称。[RFC6325]允许给定的RBridge保留多个昵称。

contents.text: The Previous RBridge Nickname TLV is an optional TLV. Multiple instances of this TLV MAY be included when an upstream RBridge is represented by more than 255 nicknames (highly unlikely).
contents.zh-CHS: 以前的RBridge昵称TLV是可选的TLV。当上游RBridge由超过255个昵称表示时（极不可能），可能包括该TLV的多个实例。

contents.text: Figure 16: Previous RBridge Nickname TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图16：以前的RBridge昵称TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 69, Previous RBridge Nickname TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：69，以前的RBridge昵称TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): 5
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：5

contents.text: o Reserved (3 octet): Set to zero on transmission and ignored on reception.
contents.zh-CHS: o 保留（3个八位组）：传输时设置为零，接收时忽略。

contents.text: o Nickname (2 octets): RBridge nickname
contents.zh-CHS: o 昵称（2个八位组）：RBridge昵称

contents.text: 8.4.9. Next-Hop RBridge List TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.9. 下一跳RBridge列表TLV

contents.text: The Next-Hop RBridge List TLV identifies the nickname or nicknames of the downstream next-hop RBridges. [RFC6325] allows a given RBridge to have multiple equal-cost paths to a specified destination. Each next-hop RBridge is represented by one of its nicknames.
contents.zh-CHS: 下一跳RBridge列表TLV标识下游下一跳RBridge的一个或多个昵称。[RFC6325]允许给定的RBridge具有多条到指定目的地的等成本路径。每个下一跳RBridge由它的一个昵称表示。

contents.text: The Next-Hop RBridge List TLV is an optional TLV. Multiple instances of this TLV MAY be included when there are more than 255 equal-cost paths to the destination.
contents.zh-CHS: 下一跳RBridge列表TLV是可选的TLV。当到达目的地的成本路径超过255条时，可能会包括该TLV的多个实例。

contents.text: Figure 17: Next-Hop RBridge List TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图17：下一跳RBridge列表TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 70, Next-Hop RBridge List TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位字节）：70，下一跳RBridge列表TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): Variable. Minimum value is 1.
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：可变。最小值为1。

contents.text: o nOfnicknames (1 octet): Indicates the number of nicknames included in this TLV. Zero (0) indicates no nicknames are included in the TLV. When this field is set to zero (0), the Length field MUST be set to 1.
contents.zh-CHS: o nOfnicknames（1个八位组）：表示此TLV中包含的昵称数。零（0）表示TLV中不包含昵称。当此字段设置为零（0）时，长度字段必须设置为1。

contents.text: o Nickname (2 octets): 16-bit RBridge nickname
contents.zh-CHS: o 昵称（2个八位字节）：16位RBridge昵称

contents.text: 8.4.10. Multicast Receiver Port Count TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.10. 多播接收器端口计数TLV

contents.text: The Multicast Receiver Port Count TLV identifies the number of ports interested in receiving the specified multicast stream within the responding RBridge on the label (VLAN or FGL) specified by the Diagnostic Label TLV.
contents.zh-CHS: 多播接收器端口计数TLV标识诊断标签TLV指定的标签（VLAN或FGL）上响应RBridge内有兴趣接收指定多播流的端口数。

contents.text: The Multicast Receiver Port Count TLV is an optional TLV.
contents.zh-CHS: 多播接收器端口计数TLV是可选的TLV。

contents.text: Figure 18: Multicast Receiver Port Count TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图18：多播接收器端口计数TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 71, Multicast Receiver Port Count TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：71，多播接收器端口计数TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): 5
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：5

contents.text: o Reserved (1 octet): Set to zero on transmission and ignored on reception.
contents.zh-CHS: o 保留（1个八位组）：传输时设置为零，接收时忽略。

contents.text: o Number of Receivers (4 octets): Indicates the number of multicast receivers available on the responding RBridge on the label specified by the diagnostic label.
contents.zh-CHS: o 接收器数量（4个八位字节）：表示诊断标签指定的标签上响应RBridge上可用的多播接收器数量。

contents.text: 8.4.11. Flow Identifier TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.11. 流标识符TLV

contents.text: The Flow Identifier TLV uniquely identifies a specific flow. The flow-identifier value is unique per MEP and needs to be interpreted as such.
contents.zh-CHS: 流标识符TLV唯一地标识特定流。每个MEP的流量标识符值都是唯一的，因此需要进行解释。

contents.text: Figure 19: Flow Identifier TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图19：流标识符TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 72, Flow Identifier TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：72，流标识符TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): 5
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：5

contents.text: o Reserved (1 octet): Set to 0 on transmission and ignored on reception.
contents.zh-CHS: o 保留（1个八位组）：传输时设置为0，接收时忽略。

contents.text: o MEP-ID (2 octets): MEP-ID of the originator [8021Q]. In TRILL, MEP-ID can take a value from 1 to 65535.
contents.zh-CHS: o MEP-ID（2个八位字节）：发起者的MEP-ID[8021Q]。在TRILL中，MEP-ID可以取1到65535之间的值。

contents.text: o flow-identifier (2 octets): Uniquely identifies the flow per MEP. Different MEPs may allocate the same flow-identifier value. The {MEP-ID, flow-identifier} pair is globally unique.
contents.zh-CHS: o 流量标识符（2个八位字节）：唯一标识每个MEP的流量。不同的MEP可以分配相同的流标识符值。{MEP-ID，流标识符}对是全局唯一的。

contents.text: Inclusion of the MEP-ID in the Flow Identifier TLV allows the inclusion of a MEP-ID for messages that do not contain a MEP-ID in their OAM header. Applications may use MEP-ID information for different types of troubleshooting.
contents.zh-CHS: 在流标识符TLV中包含MEP-ID允许为其OAM标头中不包含MEP-ID的消息包含MEP-ID。应用程序可以使用MEP-ID信息进行不同类型的故障排除。

contents.text: 8.4.12. Reflector Entropy TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.12. 反射熵TLV

contents.text: The Reflector Entropy TLV is an optional TLV. This TLV, when present, tells the responder to utilize the Reflector Entropy specified within the TLV as the flow-entropy of the response message.
contents.zh-CHS: 反射层熵TLV是可选的TLV。该TLV（当存在时）告知响应者利用TLV内指定的反射器熵作为响应消息的流熵。

contents.text: Figure 20: Reflector Entropy TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图20：反射熵TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 73, Reflector Entropy TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：73，反射熵TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): 97
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：97

contents.text: o Reserved (1 octet): Set to zero on transmission and ignored by the recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: o 保留（1个八位组）：传输时设置为零，收件人忽略。

contents.text: o Reflector Entropy (96 octets): Flow Entropy to be used by the responder. May be padded with zeros if the desired flow-entropy information is less than 96 octets.
contents.zh-CHS: o 反射熵（96个八位组）：响应者使用的流熵。如果所需的流熵信息小于96个八位字节，则可以用零填充。

contents.text: 8.4.13. Authentication TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4.13. 认证TLV

contents.text: The Authentication TLV is an optional TLV that can appear in any OAM message or reply in TRILL.
contents.zh-CHS: 认证TLV是可选的TLV，可以出现在任何OAM消息中或以TRILL形式回复。

contents.text: Figure 21: Authentication TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 图21：认证TLV

contents.text: o Type (1 octet): 74, Authentication TLV
contents.zh-CHS: o 类型（1个八位组）：74，认证TLV

contents.text: o Length (2 octets): Variable
contents.zh-CHS: o 长度（2个八位字节）：可变

contents.text: o The Auth Type and following Authentication Value are the same as the Auth Type and following value for the [IS-IS] Authentication TLV. It is RECOMMENDED that Auth Type 3 be used. Auth Types 0, 1, 2, and 54 MUST NOT be used. With Auth Type 3, the Authentication TLV is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证类型和后续身份验证值与[IS-IS]身份验证TLV的身份验证类型和后续值相同。建议使用Auth Type 3。不能使用身份验证类型0、1、2和54。对于Auth Type 3，验证TLV如下所示：

contents.text: Figure 22: Authentication TLV with Auth Type 3
contents.zh-CHS: 图22:Auth类型为3的认证TLV

contents.text: With Auth Type 3, the process is generally as specified in [RFC5310] using the same Key ID space as TRILL [IS-IS]. The area covered by the Authentication TLV is from the beginning of the TRILL Header to the end of the TRILL OAM Message Channel; the Link Header and Trailer are not included. The TRILL Header Alert, Reserved bit, and Hop Count are treated as zero for the purposes of computing and verifying the Authentication Data.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于Auth Type 3，该过程通常如[RFC5310]所述，使用与TRILL[is-is]相同的密钥ID空间。认证TLV所覆盖的区域是从TRILL报头的开始到TRILL OAM消息信道的结束；不包括连杆头和拖车。为了计算和验证身份验证数据，TRILL报头警报、保留位和跃点计数被视为零。

contents.text: Key distribution is out of the scope of this document as the keying distributed for IS-IS is used.
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥分发不在本文档范围内，因为使用了为is-is分发的密钥。

contents.text: An RBridge supporting OAM authentication can be configured to either (1) ignore received OAM Authentication TLVs and not send them, (2) ignore received OAM Authentication TLVs but include them in all OAM packets sent, or (3) to include Authentication TLVs in all OAM messages sent and enforce authentication of OAM messages received. When an RBridge is enforcing authentication, it discards any OAM message subject to OAM processing that does not contain an Authentication TLV or an Authentication TLV does not verify.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持OAM身份验证的RBridge可以配置为（1）忽略接收到的OAM身份验证TLV而不发送它们，（2）忽略接收到的OAM身份验证TLV，但将它们包括在发送的所有OAM数据包中，或者（3）在发送的所有OAM消息中包括身份验证TLV并强制对接收到的OAM消息进行身份验证。当RBridge强制进行身份验证时，它将丢弃任何经过OAM处理的、不包含身份验证TLV或身份验证TLV未验证的OAM消息。

contents.text: 9. Loopback Message
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 环回消息

contents.text: 9.1. Loopback Message Format
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1. 环回消息格式

contents.text: Figure 23: Loopback Message Format
contents.zh-CHS: 图23：环回消息格式

contents.text: The figure above depicts the format of the Loopback Request and Response messages as defined in [8021Q]. The OpCode for the Loopback Message is set to 3, and the OpCode for the reply message is set to 2 [8021Q]. The Loopback Transaction Identifier (commonly called the Session Identification Number or Session ID in this document) is a 32-bit integer that allows the requesting RBridge to uniquely identify the corresponding session. Responding RBridges, without modification, MUST echo the received "Loopback Transaction Identifier" number.
contents.zh-CHS: 上图描述了[8021Q]中定义的环回请求和响应消息的格式。环回消息的操作码设置为3，回复消息的操作码设置为2[8021Q]。环回事务标识符（在本文档中通常称为会话标识号或会话ID）是32位整数，允许请求RBridge唯一标识相应会话。未经修改的响应RBridge必须回显收到的“环回事务标识符”编号。

contents.text: 9.2. Theory of Operation
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2. 操作理论

contents.text: 9.2.1. Actions by Originator RBridge
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2.1. 发起人的行动

contents.text: The originator RBridge takes the following actions:
contents.zh-CHS: 发起人RBridge采取以下行动：

contents.text: o Identifies the destination RBridge nickname based on user specification or based on the specified destination MAC or IP address.
contents.zh-CHS: o 根据用户规范或指定的目标MAC或IP地址标识目标RBridge昵称。

contents.text: o Constructs the Flow Entropy based on user-specified parameters or implementation-specific default parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: o 基于用户指定的参数或实现特定的默认参数构造流熵。

contents.text: o Constructs the TRILL OAM header: sets the OpCode to Loopback Message type (3) [8021Q]. Assigns applicable Loopback Transaction Identifier number for the request.
contents.zh-CHS: o 构造TRILL OAM头：将操作码设置为环回消息类型（3）[8021Q]。为请求分配适用的环回事务标识符编号。

contents.text: o The TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV MUST be included with the flags set to applicable values.
contents.zh-CHS: o TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV必须包含在设置为适用值的标志中。

contents.text: o Includes following OAM TLVs, where applicable:
contents.zh-CHS: o 包括以下OAM TLV（如适用）：

contents.text: - Out-of-Band Reply Address TLV
contents.zh-CHS: - 带外应答地址TLV

contents.text: - Diagnostic Label TLV
contents.zh-CHS: - 诊断标签TLV

contents.text: - Sender ID TLV
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送者ID TLV

contents.text: o Specifies the Hop Count of the TRILL Data frame per user specification or utilize an applicable Hop Count value.
contents.zh-CHS: o 根据用户规范指定颤音数据帧的跃点计数，或使用适用的跃点计数值。

contents.text: o Dispatches the OAM frame for transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: o 分派OAM帧以进行传输。

contents.text: RBridges may continue to retransmit the request at periodic intervals until a response is received or the retransmission count expires. At each transmission, the Session Identification Number MUST be incremented.
contents.zh-CHS: RBridges可继续以周期性间隔重新传输请求，直到接收到响应或重新传输计数到期。在每次传输时，会话标识号必须递增。

contents.text: 9.2.2. Intermediate RBridge
Intermediate RBridges forward the frame as a normal data frame; no special handling is required.
contents.zh-CHS: 中间帧作为正常数据帧转发该帧；无需特殊处理。

contents.text: 9.2.3. Destination RBridge
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2.3. 目的地布里奇

contents.text: If the Loopback Message is addressed to the local RBridge and satisfies the OAM identification criteria specified in Section 3.1, then the RBridge data plane forwards the message to the CPU for further processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果环回消息发往本地RBridge并满足第3.1节中规定的OAM识别标准，则RBridge数据平面将消息转发给CPU进行进一步处理。

contents.text: The TRILL OAM application layer further validates the received OAM frame by checking for the presence of OAM Ethertype at the end of the Flow Entropy. Frames that do not contain OAM Ethertype at the end of the Flow Entropy MUST be discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM应用层通过检查流熵末尾是否存在OAM Ethertype来进一步验证接收到的OAM帧。必须丢弃流熵末尾不包含OAM Ethertype的帧。

contents.text: Construction of the TRILL OAM response:
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM响应的构建：

contents.text: o The TRILL OAM application encodes the received TRILL Header and Flow Entropy in the Original Data Payload TLV and includes it in the OAM message.
contents.zh-CHS: o TRILL OAM应用程序在原始数据有效负载TLV中对接收到的TRILL报头和流熵进行编码，并将其包括在OAM消息中。

contents.text: o Set the Return Code to (1) "Reply" and Return Sub-code to zero (0) "Valid Response". Update the TRILL OAM OpCode to 2 (Loopback Message Reply).
contents.zh-CHS: o 将返回代码设置为（1）“回复”，并将子代码设置为零（0）“有效响应”。将TRILL OAM操作码更新为2（环回消息回复）。

contents.text: o Optionally, if the VLAN/FGL identifier value of the received Flow Entropy differs from the value specified in the Diagnostic Label TLV, set the "C" flag (Cross Connect Error) in the TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV.
contents.zh-CHS: o 或者，如果接收到的流熵的VLAN/FGL标识符值不同于诊断标签TLV中指定的值，则在TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV中设置“C”标志（交叉连接错误）。

contents.text: o Include the Sender ID TLV (1).
contents.zh-CHS: o 包括发送方ID TLV（1）。

contents.text: o If in-band response was requested, dispatch the frame to the TRILL data plane with request-originator RBridge nickname as the egress RBridge nickname.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果请求带内响应，则将帧发送到TRILL数据平面，并将请求发起人RBridge昵称作为出口RBridge昵称。

contents.text: o If out-of-band response was requested, dispatch the frame to the IP forwarding process.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果请求带外响应，则将帧分派到IP转发进程。

contents.text: 10. Path Trace Message
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 路径跟踪消息

contents.text: The primary use of the Path Trace Message is for fault isolation. It may also be used for plotting the path taken from a given RBridge to another RBridge.
contents.zh-CHS: 路径跟踪消息的主要用途是用于故障隔离。它还可用于绘制从给定RBridge到另一RBridge的路径。

contents.text: [8021Q] accomplishes the objectives of the TRILL Path Trace Message using Link Trace Messages. Link Trace Messages utilize a well-known multicast MAC address. This works for [8021Q] because both the unicast and multicast paths are congruent. However, in TRILL, multicast and unicast are not congruent. Hence, TRILL OAM uses a new message format: the Path Trace Message.
contents.zh-CHS: [8021Q]使用链路跟踪消息实现颤音路径跟踪消息的目标。链路跟踪消息利用众所周知的多播MAC地址。这适用于[8021Q]，因为单播和多播路径都是一致的。然而，在TRILL中，多播和单播并不一致。因此，TRILL OAM使用了一种新的消息格式：路径跟踪消息。

contents.text: The Path Trace Message has the same format as the Loopback Message. The OpCode for Path Trace Reply is 64, and the OpCode for the Path Trace Message is 65.
contents.zh-CHS: 路径跟踪消息的格式与环回消息的格式相同。路径跟踪回复的操作码为64，路径跟踪消息的操作码为65。

contents.text: Operation of the Path Trace Message is identical to the Loopback Message except that it is first transmitted with a TRILL Header Hop Count field value of 1. The sending RBridge expects an "Intermediate RBridge" Return Sub-code from the next hop or a "Valid response" Return Sub-code response from the destination RBridge. If an "Intermediate RBridge" Return Sub-code is received in the response, the originator RBridge records the information received from the intermediate node that generated the message and resends the message by incrementing the previous Hop Count value by 1. This process is continued until, a response is received from the destination RBridge, a Path Trace process timeout occurs, or the Hop Count reaches a configured maximum value.
contents.zh-CHS: 路径跟踪消息的操作与环回消息的操作相同，不同之处在于它首先以TRILL头跃点计数字段值1进行传输。发送RBridge需要来自下一跳的“中间RBridge”返回子码或来自目标RBridge的“有效响应”返回子码响应。如果在响应中接收到“中间RBridge”返回子码，则发起者RBridge记录从生成消息的中间节点接收到的信息，并通过将前一跳计数值增加1来重新发送消息。此过程将继续，直到收到来自目标RBridge的响应、发生路径跟踪过程超时或跃点计数达到配置的最大值。

contents.text: 10.1. Theory of Operation
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1. 操作理论

contents.text: 10.1.1. Actions by Originator RBridge
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1.1. 发起人的行动

contents.text: The originator RBridge takes the following actions:
contents.zh-CHS: 发起人RBridge采取以下行动：

contents.text: o Identifies the destination RBridge based on user specification or based on location of the specified MAC address.
contents.zh-CHS: o 根据用户规范或指定MAC地址的位置标识目标RBridge。

contents.text: o Constructs the Flow Entropy based on user-specified parameters or implementation-specific default parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: o 基于用户指定的参数或实现特定的默认参数构造流熵。

contents.text: o Constructs the TRILL OAM header: set the OpCode to Path Trace Message type (65). Assign an applicable Session Identification number for the request. Return Code and Return Sub-code MUST be set to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: o 构造TRILL OAM头：将操作码设置为路径跟踪消息类型（65）。为请求分配适用的会话标识号。返回代码和返回子代码必须设置为零。

contents.text: o The TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV MUST be included with the flags set to applicable values.
contents.zh-CHS: o TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV必须包含在设置为适用值的标志中。

contents.text: o Includes the following OAM TLVs, where applicable:
contents.zh-CHS: o 包括以下OAM TLV（如适用）：

contents.text: - Out-of-Band Reply Address TLV
contents.zh-CHS: - 带外应答地址TLV

contents.text: - Diagnostic Label TLV
contents.zh-CHS: - 诊断标签TLV

contents.text: - Sender ID TLV
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送者ID TLV

contents.text: o Specifies the Hop Count of the TRILL Data frame as 1 for the first request.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于第一个请求，将颤音数据帧的跃点计数指定为1。

contents.text: o Dispatches the OAM frame to the TRILL data plane for transmission.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将OAM帧分派到TRILL数据平面进行传输。

contents.text: An RBridge may continue to retransmit the request at periodic intervals until a response is received or the retransmission count expires. At each new retransmission, the Session Identification number MUST be incremented. Additionally, for responses received from intermediate RBridges, the RBridge nickname and interface information MUST be recorded.
contents.zh-CHS: RBridge可以以周期性间隔继续重传请求，直到接收到响应或重传计数到期。每次重新传输时，会话标识号必须递增。此外，对于从中间RBridge接收的响应，必须记录RBridge昵称和接口信息。

contents.text: 10.1.2. Intermediate RBridge
Path Trace Messages transit through Intermediate RBridges transparently, unless the Hop Count has expired.
contents.zh-CHS: 路径跟踪消息透明地通过中间RBridge传输，除非跃点计数已过期。

contents.text: The TRILL OAM application layer further validates the received OAM frame by examining the presence of the TRILL Alert flag and OAM Ethertype at the end of the Flow Entropy and by examining the MD-Level. Frames that do not contain OAM Ethertype at the end of the Flow Entropy MUST be discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM应用层通过检查流熵末尾是否存在TRILL Alert标志和OAM Ethertype以及检查MD级别，进一步验证接收到的OAM帧。必须丢弃流熵末尾不包含OAM Ethertype的帧。

contents.text: Construction of the TRILL OAM response:
contents.zh-CHS: TRILL OAM响应的构建：

contents.text: o The TRILL OAM application encodes the received TRILL Header and Flow Entropy in the Original Data Payload TLV and includes it in the OAM message.
contents.zh-CHS: o TRILL OAM应用程序在原始数据有效负载TLV中对接收到的TRILL报头和流熵进行编码，并将其包括在OAM消息中。

contents.text: o Set the Return Code to (1) "Reply" and Return Sub-code to two (2) "Intermediate RBridge". Update the TRILL OAM OpCode to 64 (Path Trace Reply).
contents.zh-CHS: o 将返回代码设置为（1）“回复”，并将子代码设置为两（2）“中间RBridge”。将TRILL OAM操作码更新为64（路径跟踪回复）。

contents.text: o If the VLAN/FGL identifier value of the received Flow Entropy differs from the value specified in the diagnostic label, set the "C" flag (Cross Connect Error) in the TRILL OAM Application Identifier TLV.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果接收到的流熵的VLAN/FGL标识符值与诊断标签中指定的值不同，请在TRILL OAM应用程序标识符TLV中设置“C”标志（交叉连接错误）。

contents.text: o Include the following TLVs:
contents.zh-CHS: o 包括以下TLV：
